about_the_game:
In Desert Child, you are a young and talented hoverbike racer who needs to figure out how you can scrape enough cash together through racing and odd jobs to punch your one way ticket to the Red Planet to enter the biggest race in the universe, the Grand Prix.

Desert Child's Thee Soundtrack features original tracks by the game's designer, creator, and composer Oscar Brittain. It also features guest artists with the following licensed tracks:
  • Barksdale - Spatula (ft. Barksdale)
  • Mega Ran - Love Is Here
  • People Like Us - Prodigal Son
  • SIXIXX - Leotard Boulevard
  • Mega Ran - Losses
  • Girlfriend Material - Futon (Where Your Bed's At)

name: Desert Child - Soundtrack

Use of Tobacco

short_description: You are a hungry, young hoverbike racer who needs to get off Earth before it E-X-P-L-O-D-E-S. Hunt bounties, throw races, and do whatever you can to get to Mars and win the Grand Prix.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
